Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy
Reviews.Author: Cliff Jones
Reviews.Content: I installed a 16 camera Night Owl system at a small warehouse/showroom company.  I originally ordered the 600 TVL 100 ft night vision from Night Owl.  All 16 cameras did not work.  I then reordered the 600 TVL 50 ft night vision from Amazon....5 of these cameras were bad.  Do not purchase any of the Night Owl 600 TVL cameras.

ProductInfo.Features:
600 TV Lines of Resolution for Clear Crisp Images
50FT Night Vision & Facial Recognition
3-Axis Vandal Proof Cable System
Easy Connection to any TV (RCA) and/or DVR (BNC)
ProductInfo.Name: Night Owl Security CAM-4PK-624 4-Pack Hi-Resolution 600 TVL Security Cameras with 50-Feet of Night Vision (Black)
